item.description:
Well, the votes are in! Coriander Bistro in Sharon had an overwhelming swing in the votes, so off to India we go! The 2nd dining experience in our ethnic series commences Saturday March 19th at noon. We will enjoy an Indian buffet for $10.95 + tax and tip and whatever else you decide to order. If you do not wish to partake in the buffet, you are able to chose from the regular menu as well. Keep in mind that the buffet is the best way to go if you are new to Indian cuisine and not sure what you like quite yet. The buffet opens at noon, so getting there at the beginning of it ensures the freshest and most plentiful choices will be there to delight our palates.

This restaurant specializes in Indian and Nepalese cuisine.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Saturday, March 19th @ 12:00pm 
Coriander Bistro 
5 Post Office Square 
Sharon, MA 02067
(781) 784-2300

website: http://corianderbistro.net/

link to yelp: www.yelp.com/biz/coriander-indian-bistro-sharon

Meeting Place: Please meet inside the front door near the host station. They should have our table ready for us when we arrive.

Organizer: Alison

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members & 1 Guest - FREE, Members - $2 each, Guests - $2 each; $12 to become a 2011 Annual Member 

Min/Max: Minimum of 4 and no maximum at this time. 

Guests: 1 Guest per member.

RSVP Deadline: 8pm on Friday, March 18th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer prior to the event.

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Located right in Sharon Center, walking distance from the Sharon Commuter rail station.

Please google directions or use your GPS for the most accurate directions.

Easily accesible from Routes 27 and 95.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet inside the entrance somewhere near the host station. If you arrive late, please ask to be directed to the table for Alison or dining out group. I will make sure the host or hostess knows where we are seated, just in case.
item.why: Well, the votes are in! Coriander Bistro in Sharon had an overwhelming swing in the votes, so off to India we go!

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Passage to India at Coriander Bistro
